{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Cisco |model=AIR-CAP3502 |revision=E-A-K9 |asin=B003WD6H8Q,B00A8BN19I |newegg=N82E16833120603 |fcc_date=12/07/2009 |manuf_country=USA |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=now |type=access point |fcc_id=LDK102073,LDKTG2050 |pcb_id= |pwr_v=48 |pwr_amp=0.35 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_poe=af |cpu1_brand=Applied Micro |cpu1_model=PowerPC 460 |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=32 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Micron |ram1_model= |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe |expansion_minipcie_num=2 |jtag= |serial=yes |wi1_module=Cisco TG2050 |wi1_module_if=Mini PCIe (oversized) |wi1_chip1_brand=Marvell |wi1_chip1_model=88W8364C |wi1_chip2_brand=Marvell |wi1_chip2_model=88W8063 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module=Cisco TG2050 |wi2_module_if=Mini PCIe (oversized) |wi2_chip1_brand=Marvell |wi2_chip1_model=88W8364C |wi2_chip2_brand=Marvell |wi2_chip2_model=88W8063 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Broadcom |eth_chip2_model=BCM54610 |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=28:94:0F,54:75:D0 |oui_eth=28:94:0F,54:75:D0 }} {{TagLine|Cisco Aironet 802.11n Dual Band Access Point}} :[http://www.cisco.com/en/US/prod/collateral/wireless/ps5678/ps10981/data_sheet_c78-594630.html Product page] (3500 series) {{•}} [https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/products/collateral/wireless/aironet-3500p-access-point/data_sheet_c78-676841.html Datasheet]
Part of the [[Cisco]] Aironet 3500 series. :Dual-band controller-based 802.11a/g/n.
The CPU used in this device is an ''[[AMCC]]'' PowerPC.
*[http://www.cisco.com/web/ES/seminarios/2010/10-05-14-BN2-DOCS/10-05-14-BN2-Borderless-Network-Mobility-CleanAir-Daniel-Marin.pdf PDF doc w/ some info on the Cisco 3500 series] :[[Marvell]] 88W8364C (MAC/BBP) + 88W8063 (RF - Raven) :[[Broadcom]] BCM54610 (GbE PHY)
===See also=== *[[Cisco AIR-CAP3502P-A-K9]] • [http://www.amazon.com/AIR-CAP3502P-A-K9-Aironet-802-11n-Wireless-Access/dp/B00G2D6ON6 Amazon] *[[Cisco AIR-CAP3502E-A-K9]] • [http://www.amazon.com/AIR-CAP3502E-A-K9-Cisco-Aironet-Wireless-802-11a-G-N/dp/B005O9UQCE Amazon] • [http://www.newegg.com/Product/Product.aspx?Item=N82E16833120603 Newegg] *[[Cisco AIR-CAP3502I-A-K9]] • [http://www.amazon.com/Cisco-AIR-CAP3502I-A-K9-3500I-Series-Access/dp/B0046SQ8GC Amazon] *[[Cisco AIR-CAP3702E-A-K9]] • [http://www.amazon.com/dp/B00UMARM68 Amazon] *[[Cisco AIR-CAP3802I-A-K9]] • [http://www.amazon.com/dp/B01HAO0YOK Amazon]
